name: Gatherer
description:
THE WORLD IS BEING DEVOURED BY AN EVER-MOVING VOID!
Your goal is to survive for as long as possible!

To survive you have to think ahead, build and plan your route, and use your compass to find powerful upgrades!

This game is heavily inspired by 'Curious Expedition', and is a tun-based endless runner?! I'm not quite sure how to describe it.

Have fun!
